HomeSection.title: Front-end & Android Developer
HomeSection.about: I am a systems engineer and a software developer with more than 10 year of experience, specializing in Frontend, Android and backend technologies. My expertise includes React Js, Jetpack compose and Laravel. I love creating effective applications, optimizing processes, and offering solutions that positively impact customers. Additionally, I am an enthusiastic learner and analytical, generally, I am updating my knowledge about the areas that call my attention.

first-project.title: AppSurgas
first-project.description: AppSurgas is an Android application built to take readings of gas counters, the application had modules of reading verification, incorrect reading notifications among many more functions.

second-project.title: Naranja ERP - POS
second-project.description: Application to keep inventory records, clients, users, reports and more.

third-project.title: Private - Artificial intelligence
third-project.description: Web application for handling a large amount of processed multimedia by artificial intelligence. In this application, the atomic design structure type was applied to keep reusable components.

fourth-project.title: Todo app
fourth-project.description: Web application to manage task lists.

fifth-project.title: Gadget shop
fifth-project.description: Web application to manage orders and products in the store.

sixth-project.title: Gadget app
sixth-project.description: Mobile application to manage orders and products in the store.

seventh-project.title: Tickets app
seventh-project.description: Web application to manage event tickets.

eighth-project.title: Instacamp
eighth-project.description: Clone of Instagram for the web with the functionality of publishing photos, texts and more.

ninth-project.title: Nearby Parking
ninth-project.description: Android application to find the nearest parking spots using the GPS and radius defined by the user.
